item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Snyk security researcher deploys malicious NPM packages targeting cursor.com (303 points | 149 comments)
2. ZFS 2.3.0 released with ZFS raidz expansion (96 points | 39 comments)
3. The Plunge (2014) (124 points | 16 comments)
4. Webtop – Alpine,Ubuntu,Fedora,and Arch containers containing full desktop envs (183 points | 28 comments)
5. I created an open-source Hardware Hacking Wiki – with tutorials for beginners (506 points | 71 comments)
6. A secure distributed actor language (31 points | 3 comments)
7. Debugging: Indispensable rules for finding even the most elusive problems (2004) (457 points | 202 comments)
8. Dragonfly's extreme loop-the-loops (69 points | 23 comments)
9. voyage-code-3 (62 points | 20 comments)
10. Campsite is now open source (54 points | 28 comments)
11. Fluid Simulation Pendant (312 points | 43 comments)
12. Lines of code that will beat A/B testing every time (2012) (273 points | 125 comments)
13. How we used GPT-4o for image detection with 350 similar illustrations (137 points | 56 comments)
14. Training AI models might not need enormous data centres (38 points | 11 comments)
15. A laptop stand made from a single sheet of recycled paper (277 points | 213 comments)
16. What Is Treewidth? (7 points | 1 comment)
17. Why Can't Programmers Be More Like Ants? Or a Lesson in Stigmergy (2015) (13 points | 6 comments)
18. Can you complete the Oregon Trail if you wait at a river for 14272 years? (181 points | 88 comments)
19. U.S. Employee Engagement Sinks to 10-Year Low (13 points | 23 comments)
20. James Thomson on the Origins of the macOS Dock (37 points | 19 comments)
21. Ships must practice celestial navigation (86 points | 86 comments)
22. Why is my CPU usage always 100%? (476 points | 133 comments)
23. When a winter storm trapped a luxury passenger train near Donner Pass (124 points | 86 comments)
24. Sonos CEO steps down after app update debacle (355 points | 389 comments)
25. FreeBSD Suspend/Resume (106 points | 44 comments)
26. AI Engineer Reading List (362 points | 51 comments)
27. The Sikh Practice of Langar, a Free Meal Where Everyone Is Equal (4 points | discuss)
28. How corn syrup took over America (126 points | 163 comments)
29. Entropy of a Large Language Model output (148 points | 58 comments)
30. The Origins of Wokeness (752 points | 1709 comments)
